text: Activision Blizzard, Inc. is an American video game holding company. They are based in Santa Monica, California. The company was founded in July 2008, when Activision merged with Blizzard Entertainment. Since 2015, it has been one of the stocks that make up the S&P; 500. Microsoft announced its plans to buy Activision Blizzard for $68.7 billion on January 18, 2022. Activision Blizzard would become a division of Microsoft Gaming, while making Microsoft the third largest gaming company after Tencent and Sony. ==References== Category:Video game companies of the United States Category:Companies based in Santa Monica, California Category:Microsoft Category:2008 establishments in California
